GR14ss3_paru:3722: ca vastutas tad-ayogāt tatra tat-sattayā tat-sattā kartuṃ na śakyata eva / tri-
GR14ss3_paru:3723: sargasya tu tac-chakti-viśiṣṭād bhagavato mukhya-vṛttyaiva jātatvena
GR14ss3_paru:3726: ca / āropas tu tathāpi dhāmnety ādi-rītyaivācintya-śaktitvāt tena
GR14ss3_paru:3729: jyotsnā vistāriṇī yathety anusāreṇa tat-sattayā tat-sattā bhavati /
GR14ss3_paru:3730: tato bhagavato mukhyaṃ satyatvaṃ tri-sargasya ca na mithyātvam iti / tathā ca
GR14ss3_paru:3731: śrutiḥ satyasya satyam iti tathā prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eva satyam iti
GR14ss3_paru:3735: atha tam eva taṭastha-lakṣaṇena ca tathā vyañjayan prathamaṃ viśadārthatayā
GR14ss3_paru:3736: brahma-sūtrāṇām eva vivṛtir iyaṃ saṃhiteti bibodayiṣayā ca tad-antaraṃ
GR14ss3_paru:3737: sūtram eva prathamam anuvadati janmādyasya yata iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3744: yato yasmād acintya-śaktyā svayam upādāna-rūpāt kartrādi-rūpāc ca
GR14ss3_paru:3747: vāruṇir varuṇaṃ pitaram upasasāra adhīhi bho bhagavo brahmety ārabhya
GR14ss3_paru:3748: yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante yena jātāni jīvanti yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti
GR14ss3_paru:3752: janmādikam iho lakṣaṇaṃ na tu viśeṣaṇam /
GR14ss3_paru:3760: jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ sarvasya vaśī ity ādi śruteḥ [Muṇḍ 1.1.9, 2.2.7]/ tathā
GR14ss3_paru:3763: na tasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vidyate ity ādi śruteḥ / ye tu
GR14ss3_paru:3764: nirviśeṣa-vastu jijñāsyam iti vadanti tan-mate brahma-jijñāsāyāṃ janmā̆dyasya
GR14ss3_paru:3779: jaḍād vyāvartakaṃ svasya parasya ca vyavahāra-yogyatāpādana-svabhāvena
GR14ss3_paru:3780: bhavati / tathā sati svaiśeṣatvaṃ tad-abhāve prakāśataiva na syāt /
GR14ss3_paru:3782: syāt / kiṃ ca tejo-vāri-mṛdām ity anenaiva teṣāṃ vivakṣitaṃ setsyatīti
GR14ss3_paru:3786: śaktiś cāntarāṅgā bahiraṅgā taḍasthā ceti tridhā darśitā /
GR14ss3_paru:3787: tatra vikārātmakeṣu jagaj-janmādiṣu sākṣād-dhetunā bahiraṅgāyā eva syād
GR14ss3_paru:3791: puruṣād evāsya janmādi tathāpi bhagavaty eva tad-dhetunā paryavasati /
GR14ss3_paru:3792: samudraika-deśe yasya janmādi tasya samudra eva janmādīni / yathoktam -
GR14ss3_paru:3797: tasya ca bhagavato janmādyasya yata ity anenāpi mūrtatvam eva labhyate / yato
GR14ss3_paru:3801: tasya mūrtatve saty anyato janmāpatet anavasthāpatter
GR14ss3_paru:3809: tad evaṃ mūrtatve siddhe sa ca mūrto viṣṇu-nārāyaādi-
GR14ss3_paru:3810: sākṣād-rūpakaḥ śrī-bhagavān eva nānyaḥ / tathā ca -
GR14ss3_paru:3815: ity ādi tat-pratipādaka-sahasra-nāmādau tatraiva tu yathoktam anirdeśya-
GR14ss3_paru:3818: sraṣṭā pātā ca saṃhartā sa eko harir īśvaraḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:3821: sṛṣṭy-ādikaṃ samastaṃ tu viṣṇor eva paraṃ bhavet // iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3822: mahopaniṣadi ca - sa brahmaṇā sṛjati sa rudreṇa vilāpayati ity ādikam / ata
GR14ss3_paru:3825: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sarvaś ca kālasyārūpiṇas tava // iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3826: tava yo rūpa-rahitaḥ kālaḥ kāla-śaktis tasya nimitta-mātram iti vyadhikaraṇa
GR14ss3_paru:3827: eva ṣaṣṭhī / tathā ādyo'vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasyety ādi /
GR14ss3_paru:3830: tad evam atrāpi tathāvidha-mūrtir bhagavān evopakrāntaḥ / tad evaṃ
GR14ss3_paru:3831: taṭastha-lakṣaṇena paraṃ nirdhārya tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ brahma-sūtre śāstra-
GR14ss3_paru:3832: yonitvāt, tat tu samanvayād ity etat-sūtra-dvayena (1.1.3-4)
GR14ss3_paru:3844: atra tarkāpratiṣṭhānaṃ caivam - īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati
GR14ss3_paru:3869: [Taitt 2.1.3] ānando brahmeti ekam evādvitīyaṃ brahma iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3871: iti / sad eva somyedam agra āsīd iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3872: ātmā vā idam eka evāgra āsīt puruṣa-
GR14ss3_paru:3873: vidha iti / puruṣo ha vai nārāyaṇa iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3874: eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīd iti / bahu
GR14ss3_paru:3876: tasmād vā etasmād ātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūta
GR14ss3_paru:3878: yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyanta iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3880: nārāyaṇo'kāmayata atha nārāyaṇād ajo'jā̆āyata yataḥ prajāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GR14ss3_paru:3881: nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ param ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma
GR14ss3_paru:3885: ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad
GR14ss3_paru:3886: eṣa ākāśa ānando na syād iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3887: eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na ca
GR14ss3_paru:3892: tad evaṃ sūtra-dvayārthe sthite tad etad vyācaṣṭe,
GR14ss3_paru:3894: iti / artheṣu nānā-vidheṣu veda-vākyārtheṣ satsv anvayāt anvaya-mukhena
GR14ss3_paru:3895: yato yasmāt ekasmād asya janmādi pratīyate tathetarato vyatireka-mukhena
GR14ss3_paru:3896: ca yasmād evāsya tataḥ pratīyata ity arthaḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:3899: dhvanitam / eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīd ity ādi-śāstra-pramāṇatvena prāk-
GR14ss3_paru:3901: athekṣater nāśabdam iti vyācaṣṭe abhijña iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3903: chāndogye sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyaṃ brahma tad aikṣata
GR14ss3_paru:3909: tac ca nety āha īkṣater iti / yasmin
GR14ss3_paru:3910: śabda eva pramāṇaṃ na bhavati tad-aśabdam ānumānikaṃ pradhānam ity
GR14ss3_paru:3916: tad aikṣatetīkṣaṇaṃ cācetane pradhāne na sambhavet / anyatra
GR14ss3_paru:3918: sa aikṣata lokānusṛjā iti sa imān lokān asṛjatety
GR14ss3_paru:3919: ādau / īkṣaṇaṃ cātra tadeśa-sṛjya-vicārātmakatvāt sarvajñatvam eva
GR14ss3_paru:3922: nanu tadānīyam evādvitīyam ity uktes tasyekṣaṇa-sādhanaṃ na sambhavati
GR14ss3_paru:3926: ca vdiyata ity ādau svābhāvikī jñāna-bala-kriyā cety ādi śruteḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:3927: etenekṣaṇavan-mūrtimattvam api tasya svābhāvaikam ity āyātam /
GR14ss3_paru:3930: atra śāstra-yonitvād ity asyārthāntaraṃ vyācaṣṭe tena iti /
GR14ss3_paru:3932: yathā kathaṃ tasya jagaj-janmādi-kartṛtvaṃ kathaṃ vā nānya-tantroktasya
GR14ss3_paru:3936: evaṃ vā are asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitam etad yadṛg-vedo
GR14ss3_paru:3937: yajur-vedaḥ sāmavedo'tha vāṅgirasa itihāsa-purāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ
GR14ss3_paru:3942: tad evaṃ mukhyaṃ sarvajñaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vinā ca sarva-śṛṣṭy-
GR14ss3_paru:3943: ādikam anyasya nopapadyat iti prokta-lakṣaṇaṃ brahmaiva jagat-kāraṇaṃ na
GR14ss3_paru:3945: tad eva vivṛtyāha tene brahma hṛdā ya
GR14ss3_paru:3947: brahma vedam ādi-kavaye brahmaṇe brahmāṇaṇaṃ hṛdāntaḥ-
GR14ss3_paru:3951: atra bṛhad-vācakena brahma-padena sarva-jñāna-mayatvaṃ tasya jñāpitam /
GR14ss3_paru:3957: yo vai vedāṃś ca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GR14ss3_paru:3960: mukta-jīvā api tat-kāraṇaṃ nety āha muhyantīti /
GR14ss3_paru:3964: brahmādi-vividhānana-locanaś ca yaḥ padmanābhas tad-ādi-mūrtikaḥ śrī-
GR14ss3_paru:3969: atha tat tu samanvayād ity asyāntaraṃ,
GR14ss3_paru:3973: vedārtha-parijñātaṃ yasmāt tu śāstra-nidānatvaṃ niścīyata iti jīve samyak /
GR14ss3_paru:3974: jñānam eva nāsti pradhānaṃ tv acenam eveti bhāvaḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:3978: bodhayituṃ jīvānāṃ sarveṣām api tadīya-samyag-jñānābhāvam āha
GR14ss3_paru:3980: sūrayaḥ śeṣādayo'pi yad yatra śabda-brahmaṇi muhyanti / tad
GR14ss3_paru:3982: kiṃ vidhatte kim ācaṣṭe kim anūdya vikalpayet /
GR14ss3_paru:3983: ity asyā hṛdayaṃ loke nānyā mad veda kaścana // iti (BhP 11.21.42) /
GR14ss3_paru:3985: athekṣater nāśabdam ity asyārthāntaram abhiijña ity atraiva vyañjitam asti /
GR14ss3_paru:3986: atra sūtrārthaḥ - nanv aśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayam ity ādi śruteḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:3988: tatra hi prakṛta-brahma śabda-hīnaṃ na bhavati /
GR14ss3_paru:3990: īkṣateḥ / tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajyāyeyety atra bahu syām iti
GR14ss3_paru:3999: atra pūrvavat tādṛśaṃ sadharmakatvaṃ mūrtimattvam api siddham / yathāhuḥ
GR14ss3_paru:4008: janmādyasya yata iti praṇavārthaḥ sṛṣṭy-ādi-śaktimattva-vācitvāt / tad evam
GR14ss3_paru:4009: evāgni-purāṇe gāyatrī-vyākhyāne proktam taj-jyotir bhagavān viṣṇur jagaj-
GR14ss3_paru:4017: sūcitā / tad eva kṛpayā svadhyānāyāsmākaṃ buddhi-vṛttīḥ prerayatād iti
GR14ss3_paru:4018: bhāvaḥ / evam evoktaṃ gāyatryā ca samārambha iti /
GR14ss3_paru:4020: tad-dharmopadeśād ity ādinā sampratipannaṃ yan-mūrtaṃ tad-ādy-ananta-
GR14ss3_paru:4023: evaṃ sandhyā-vidhiṃ kṛtvā gāyatrīṃ ca japet smaret /
GR14ss3_paru:4024: gāyatry-ukthāni śāstrāṇi bhargaṃ prāṇāṃs tathaiva ca //
GR14ss3_paru:4025: tataḥ smṛteyaṃ gāyatrī sāvitrī yata eva ca /
GR14ss3_paru:4027: taj-jyotiḥ paramaṃ brahma bhargas tejo yataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4028: bhargaḥ syāt bhrājata iti bahulaṃ chandasīritam //
GR14ss3_paru:4029: vareṇyaṃ sarva-tejobhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vai paramaṃ param /
GR14ss3_paru:4032: nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddham ekaṃ nityaṃ bhargam adhīśvaram //
GR14ss3_paru:4033: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotir dhyāyema hi vimuktaye /
GR14ss3_paru:4035: śivaṃ kecit paṭhanti sma śakti-rūpaṃ paṭhanti ca /
GR14ss3_paru:4036: kecit sūryaṃ kecid agniṃ daivatāny agni-hotriṇaḥ //
GR14ss3_paru:4037: agny-ādi-rūpo viṣṇur hi vedādau brahma gīyate /
GR14ss3_paru:4038: tat padaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇor devasya svaituḥ smṛtam //
GR14ss3_paru:4040: no'smākaṃ yac ca bhargas tat sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ dhiyaḥ //
GR14ss3_paru:4043: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhram eva vā /
GR14ss3_paru:4045: svargādyaiḥ krīḍate devī yo haṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4047: satyaṃ sadā-śivaṃ brahma viṣṇor yat paramaṃ padam /
GR14ss3_paru:4048: devasya svaitur devo vareṇyaṃ hi turīyakam //
GR14ss3_paru:4050: janānāṃ śubha-karmādīn pravartayati yaḥ sadā // ity ādi /
GR14ss3_paru:4054: tasmād bhaga brahma parā viṣṇur bhagavatac-chabdābhinna-varṇatayā tatra
GR14ss3_paru:4055: tatra nirdiṣṭā api bhagavat-pratipādakā eva jñeyāḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4057: ahaṃgrahopāsanā-nirdeśas tat-sāmya iva labdhe hi tad-upāsanā-yogyatā
GR14ss3_paru:4060: sthāna-nirodhā jandmādy asya yataḥ ity atra /
GR14ss3_paru:4064: jīvānām api tat-sānnidhye sati kuhaka-nirasana-vyañjake dhāmnety ādau /
GR14ss3_paru:4066: sa ca svayaṃ-bhagavattvena nirṇīyatvāt śrī-kṛṣṇa eveti pūrvokta-prakāra eva
GR14ss3_paru:4067: vyakta iti / tad evam asminn upakrama-vākye sarveṣu pada-vākya-tātparyeṣu
GR14ss3_paru:4068: tasya dhyeyasya saviśeṣatvaṃ mūrtitvaṃ bhagavad-ākāraṃ ca vyaktam / tac ca
GR14ss3_paru:4071: yaḥ sṛṣṭyedam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakra-puraḥ śāsti tāḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4072: yaṃ sampadya jahāty ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyaṃ yathā
GR14ss3_paru:4073: taṃ kaivalya-nirasta-yonim abhayaṃ dhyāyed ajasraṃ harim // iti /[BhP 10.87.50]
GR14ss3_paru:4074: ato dharmaḥ projjhitety ādāv anantara-vākye'pi kiṃ vā parair ity ādinā
GR14ss3_paru:4077: kasmai yena vibhāsito'yam ity ādi-darśitam tasya tādṛśa-viśeṣavattvādikam /
GR14ss3_paru:4078: yathaiva ātma-gṛhītir itaravad uttarād ity atra (Vs 3.3.16) śaṅkara-
GR14ss3_paru:4080: vācyasyātmatvam upasaṃhārasthād ātma-śabdāl labhyate tadvad ihāpi
GR14ss3_paru:4081: catuḥślokī-vaktur bhagavattvaṃ darśitaṃ ca śrī-vyāsa-samādhāv api tasyaiva
GR14ss3_paru:4088: bhagavatā vibhāsitaḥ prakāśitaḥ na tu tadāpi racitaḥ ayaṃ śrī-bhāgavata-
GR14ss3_paru:4089: rūpaḥ purā pūrva-parārdhādau tad-rūpeṇa brahma-rūpeṇa tad-rūpiṇā śrī-
GR14ss3_paru:4094: tad-rūpeṇety ādibhis tribhiḥ padair na kevalaṃ catuḥśloky
GR14ss3_paru:4095: eva tena prakāśitā kiṃ tarhi tatra tatrāviṣṭenākhaṇḍam eva purāṇam iti
GR14ss3_paru:4097: atra mad-rūpeṇa ca yuṣmabhyam iti saṅkocenānukto'pi śrī-sūta-vākya-śeṣo
GR14ss3_paru:4098: gamyaḥ / evaṃ sarvasyāpi śrī-bhāgavata-guror mahimā darśitaḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4104: anuttamam iti sahasra-nāma-stotrāt para-śabdena ca śrī-bhagavān evocyate /
GR14ss3_paru:4107: prerakatvenābhidhānād gāyatryā apy artho'yaṃ grantha iti darśayati / tad
GR14ss3_paru:4113: harir itaratra na gīyate hy abhīkṣṇam /
GR14ss3_paru:4118: virāḍ-antaryāmī nārāyaṇo'pi tat-pālako viṣṇur vāpi na gīyate kvacid gīyate
GR14ss3_paru:4119: vā tatra tv abhīkṣṇaṃ naiva gīyate tu-śabdo'vadhāraṇe sākṣāt śrī-bhagavān
GR14ss3_paru:4122: varṇitās te'py aśeṣā eva mūrtayo'vatārā yasya saḥ /
GR14ss3_paru:4126: padaṃ padam api lakṣyīkṛtya bhagavān eva pari sarvato-bhāvena paṭhito
GR14ss3_paru:4137: satām ātmanaḥ prāṇeśvarasya yad vā vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī satām ātmanaḥ
GR14ss3_paru:4142: yasyāṃ vai śrūyamāṇāyām ity [BhP 1.7.7] ādikaṃ ca
GR14ss3_paru:4147: yaṃ brahma varuṇendra-rudra-marutaḥ stunvanti divyaiḥ stavair
GR14ss3_paru:4150: yasyāntaṃ na viduḥ surāsura-gaṇā devāya tasmai namaḥ // [BhP 12.13.1]
GR14ss3_paru:4163: dvedhā darśayati dṛśyānāṃ jaḍānāṃ buddhy-ādīnāṃ darśanaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ
GR14ss3_paru:4164: draṣṭāraṃ vinā na ghaṭata jñānopapatti-dvārā lakṣaṇaiḥ sva-prakāśa-
GR14ss3_paru:4165: draṣṭṛa-lakṣakaiḥ tathā buddhy-ādīni kartṛ prayojyāni karaṇatvād
GR14ss3_paru:4171: antaryāmī lakṣitaḥ tatas tena bhagavān api lakṣita ity arthaḥ / sa ca sa ca
GR14ss3_paru:4174: darśanāt karmaṇo jaḍatvāt karmaṇo jaḍatvāt sarveṣām api jīvānāṃ tatra
GR14ss3_paru:4175: tatra pravṛttir antaḥ-prayojaka-viśeṣaṃ vinā na ghaṭata ity anupapatti-
GR14ss3_paru:4177: eṣa hy anenātmanā cakṣuṣā darśayati śrotreṇa
GR14ss3_paru:4178: śrāvayati manasā mānayati buddhyā bodhayati tasmād etā bāhuḥ / mṛtir
GR14ss3_paru:4182: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat // iti /
GR14ss3_paru:4195: eko nāneyate tadvad bhagavān śāstra-vartmabhiḥ // [BhP 3.32.33] ity

GR14ss3_paru:4213: [*ENDNOTE #4] This verse is first quoted in Śrīdhara's commentary to BhP
GR14ss3_paru:4217: [*ENDNOTE #7] Not found in Gita Press edition.
GR14ss3_paru:4218: [*ENDNOTE #8] ambuvad agrahaṇāt tu na tathātvam is the full sūtra.
